column22: LifeLock Inc., founded in 2005, is an American identity theft protection company based in Tempe, Arizona. The company charges $10 a month for the LifeLock identity theft protection intended to detect fraudulent applications for some forms of credit and non-credit related services. It also provides a $1 million guarantee in the event of identity theft to pay for fees associated with collecting on stolen funds, and the guarantee is backed by identity theft insurance to cover other losses. (Source: LifeLock)
